basics.name: Ujjwal Ojha
basics.label: Kathmandu, Nepal
basics.summary: I am a FullStack Software Developer, mostly focussed on Backend, with some experience on Ops. I am a big advocator of Software Maintainability and I am very influential about applying SOLID principles and design patterns while designing software systems. I like to design microservices applying best practices for distributed system. I am also a big fan of Domain Driven Design and CQRS and have some experience introducing these techniques in new microservices. I also like to call myself a pragmatic when engineering systems who is able to balance between what looks pretty on paper and what is effective on real world.

work.summary: Working as a Full stack Engineer mostly on Microservices architecture.
highlights: Handle smooth migration of third party system with zero downtime on production system
Re-engineer microservice to handle more traffic
Introduce Domain Driven Design and CQRS to architecture a new microservice.
Architecture fallback based strategy for microservice
Brainstorming new product ideas and implement A/B testing with the team
Being a part of on-call team roaster responsbile for co-ordinating issues, troubleshooting and preparing incident reports.

work.summary: Worked on distributed system for Managed security service provider (MSSP).
highlights: Interacted with other team of developers for API compatibility and smoothly develop new features maintaining compatibility.
Engineer an event based system to scale the distributed system of MSSP asynchronously.
Engineer a system for MSSP to be able to handle multiple version of a SIEM system.

work.summary: Architectured a distributed web application system(SaaS). Lead a team of developers together to deliver business goals. Practice continuous delivery and Agile to deliver software as quickly as possible to the end user.
highlights: Develop microservices to build scalable SaaS systems.
Formulate a plan to refactor a legacy system using old technologies to new technologies and implemented it in a running system.
Automate microservices deployment.
Create internal systems for smoothening/simplifying internal processes.

work.summary: I worked as a Software Engineer on multiple freelance projects.
highlights: Developing REST APIs
Incorporate development best practices in application to create maintainable systems.
Perform optimizations in backend to reduce application response time and reduce server cost in higher traffic.
Developing Single Page applications
Developing application architecture
Coding Modules
Maintaining production server

education.institution: Orchid Intl. College(affiliated to Tribhuvan Univertisy)
